name: SPACE ROCKS AND PIRATES!
description:
A clone of Asteroids, few changes added to my personal liking. Stays almost the same, but difficulty is increased quite a bit. May receive future updates.

SPACE - To fire

LEFT / RIGHT ARROW KEY - Turn direction.

UP ARROW KEY - Move forward.

Depending on how I would like to improve the game, I may add additional waves, difficulty settings and new enemies or obstacles.
